abstract: Florida chapter of Council on American-Islamic Relations files federal suit against Florida Gun Supply of Inverness, store that had declared itself Muslim-free zone.
lead_paragraph: The state chapter of the Council on American-Islamic Relations on Wednesday filed a federal lawsuit against a gun store that had proclaimed itself a Muslim-free zone.

headline.main: Florida: Gun Store Sued Over Muslim-Free Zone
headline.print_headline: Florida: Gun Store Sued Over Muslim-Free Zone

snippet: The state chapter of the Council on American-Islamic Relations on Wednesday filed a federal lawsuit against a gun store that had proclaimed itself a Muslim-free zone.
